   22: 
   23: -module(ssl_trace_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_api.hrl").
   28: 
   29: -export([suite/0,
   30:          all/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          init_per_testcase/2,
   34:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   35: 
   36: -export([tc_basic/0,
   37:          tc_basic/1,
   38:          tc_no_trace/0,
   39:          tc_no_trace/1,
   40:          tc_api_profile/0,
   41:          tc_api_profile/1,
   42:          tc_rle_profile/0,
   43:          tc_rle_profile/1,
   44:          tc_budget_option/0,
   45:          tc_budget_option/1,
   46:          tc_file_option/0,
   47:          tc_file_option/1,
   48:          tc_write/0,
   49:          tc_write/1,
   50:          tc_check_profiles/0,
   51:          tc_check_profiles/1]).
   52: -define(TRACE_FILE, "ssl_trace.txt").
   53: 
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   56: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: suite() -> [{timetrap,{seconds,60}}].
   58: 
   59: all() -> [tc_basic, tc_no_trace, tc_api_profile, tc_rle_profile,
   60:           tc_budget_option, tc_write, tc_file_option, tc_check_profiles].
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     catch crypto:stop(),
   64:     try crypto:start() of
   65: 	ok ->
   66: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   67:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config)
   68:     catch _:_ ->
   69: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   70:     end.
   71: 
   72: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   73:     ssl:stop(),
   74:     application:stop(crypto).
   75: 
   76: init_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: end_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
   80:     ssl_trace:stop(),
   81:     Config.
   82: 
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   85: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   86: tc_basic() ->
   87:     [{doc, "Basic test of ssl_trace API"}].
   88: tc_basic(_Config) ->
   89:     {ok, L0} = ssl_trace:start(),
   90:     true = is_pid(whereis(ssl_trace)),
   91:     true = is_list(L0),
   92:     {ok,L0} = ssl_trace:on(),
   93:     {ok,L0} = ssl_trace:on(),
   94:     L0 = ssl_trace:is_on(),
   95:     [] = ssl_trace:is_off(),
   96: 
   97:     L1 = [hd(L0)],
   98:     L2 = tl(L0),
   99:     {ok,L1} = ssl_trace:off(L2),
  100: 
  101:     L1 = ssl_trace:is_on(),
  102:     L2 = ssl_trace:is_off(),
  103: 
  104:     {ok,[]} = ssl_trace:off(),
  105:     {ok,[]} = ssl_trace:off(),
  106: 
  107:     [] = ssl_trace:is_on(),
  108:     L0 = ssl_trace:is_off(),
  109:     ok = ssl_trace:stop(),
  110:     undefined = whereis(ssl_trace),
  111: 
  112:     {ok, EnabledProfiles} = ssl_trace:start(),
  113:     [true = lists:member(ExpectedProfile, EnabledProfiles) ||
  114:         ExpectedProfile <- [api, crt, csp, hbn, kdt, rle, ssn]],
  115:     {ok, [api]} = ssl_trace:on(api),
  116:     {ok, []} = ssl_trace:off(api),
  117:     ok = ssl_trace:stop(),
  118:     ok.
  119: 
  120: tc_no_trace() ->
  121:     [{doc, "Verify there are no traces if not enabled"}].
  122: tc_no_trace(Config) ->
  123:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(),
  124:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  125:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  126:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  127:     ExpectedTraces =
  128:         #{call => [], processed => [], exception_from => [], return_from => []},
  129:     ExpectedTraces = receive_map(Ref),
  130:     ok = ssl_trace:stop(),
  131:     ok.
  132: 
  133: tc_api_profile() ->
  134:     [{doc, "Verify traces for 'api' trace profile"}].
  135: tc_api_profile(Config) ->
  136:     On = [api, rle],
  137:     Off = [],
  138:     TracesAfterConnect =
  139:         #{
  140:           call =>
  141:               [{"    (server) -> ssl:handshake/2", ssl, handshake},
  142:                {"    (server) -> tls_server_connection:initial_hello/3",
  143:                 tls_server_connection, initial_hello},
  144:                {"    (client) -> tls_client_connection:initial_hello/3",
  145:                 tls_client_connection, initial_hello}],
  146:          return_from =>
  147:               [{"    (server) <- ssl:listen/2 returned", ssl, listen},
  148:                {"    (server) <- tls_server_connection:initial_hello/3 returned",
  149:                 tls_server_connection, initial_hello},
  150:                {"    (client) <- tls_client_connection:initial_hello/3 returned",
  151:                 tls_client_connection, initial_hello},
  152:                {"    (client) <- ssl_gen_statem:connect/8 returned",
  153:                 ssl_gen_statem, connect},
  154:                {"    (client) <- ssl:connect/3 returned", ssl, connect},
  155:                {"    (server) <- ssl:handshake/2 returned", ssl, handshake},
  156:                {"    (client) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init},
  157:                {"    (server) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init}],
  158:           processed =>
  159:               ["rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*client)",
  160:                "rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*server)",
  161:                "rle ('?') -> ssl:listen/2 (*server) Args",
  162:                "rle ('?') -> ssl:connect/3 (*client) Args",
  163:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*server)",
  164:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*client)",
  165:                "api (client) -> ssl_gen_statem:connect/8"]},
  166:     TracesAfterDisconnect =
  167:         #{
  168:           call =>
  169:               [{"    (client) -> ssl:close/1", ssl, close},
  170:                {"    (client) -> ssl:close/1", ssl, close},
  171:                {"    (client) -> ssl_gen_statem:close/2", ssl_gen_statem, close},
  172:                {"    (client) -> ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1",
  173:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert},
  174:                {"    (server) -> ssl:close/1", ssl, close},
  175:                {"    (server) -> ssl_gen_statem:close/2", ssl_gen_statem, close},
  176:                {"    (server) -> ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1",
  177:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert}],
  178:          return_from =>
  179:               [{"    (client) <- ssl:close/1 returned", ssl, close},
  180:                {"    (client) <- ssl:close/1 returned", ssl, close},
  181:                {"    (client) <- ssl_gen_statem:close/2 returned",
  182:                 ssl_gen_statem, close},
  183:                {"    (client) <- ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1 returned",
  184:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert},
  185:                {"    (server) <- ssl:close/1 returned", ssl, close},
  186:                {"    (server) <- ssl_gen_statem:close/2 returned",
  187:                 ssl_gen_statem, close},
  188:                {"    (server) <- ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1 returned",
  189:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert}],
  190:           exception_from =>
  191:               [{"    (server) exception_from ssl_gen_statem:init/1  {exit,{shutdown,normal}}",
  192:                 ssl_gen_statem, init},
  193:                {"    (client) exception_from ssl_gen_statem:init/1  {exit,{shutdown,normal}}",
  194:                 ssl_gen_statem, init}]},
  195:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(),
  196:     {ok, On} = ssl_trace:on(On),
  197:     Delta = On -- Off,
  198:     {ok, Delta} = ssl_trace:off(Off),
  199:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  200:     UnhandledTraceCnt1 =
  201:         #{call => 2, processed => 0, exception_from => no_trace_received,
  202:           return_from => 2},
  203:     check_trace_map(Ref, TracesAfterConnect, UnhandledTraceCnt1),
  204:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  205:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  206:     UnhandledTraceCnt2 =
  207:         #{call => 0, processed => no_trace_received, exception_from => 0,
  208:           return_from => 0},
  209:     check_trace_map(Ref, TracesAfterDisconnect, UnhandledTraceCnt2),
  210:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  211:     ok.
  212: 
  213: tc_rle_profile() ->
  214:     [{doc, "Verify traces for 'rle' trace profile"}].
  215: tc_rle_profile(Config) ->
  216:     On = [rle],
  217:     ExpectedTraces =
  218:         #{
  219:           call =>
  220:               [],
  221:          return_from =>
  222:               [{"    (client) <- ssl:connect/3 returned", ssl, connect},
  223:                {"    (server) <- ssl:listen/2 returned", ssl, listen},
  224:                {"    (client) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init},
  225:                {"    (server) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init}],
  226:           processed =>
  227:               ["rle ('?') -> ssl:listen/2 (*server) Args =",
  228:                "rle ('?') -> ssl:connect/3 (*client) Args",
  229:                "rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*server) Args = [[server",
  230:                "rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*client) Args = [[client",
  231:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*server)",
  232:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*client)"]},
  233:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(),
  234:     {ok, On} = ssl_trace:on(On),
  235:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  236:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  237:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  238:     UnhandledTraceCnt =
  239:         #{call => no_trace_received, processed => 0, exception_from => 2,
  240:           return_from => 0},
  241:     check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces, UnhandledTraceCnt),
  242:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  243:     ok.
  244: 
  245: tc_budget_option() ->
  246:     [{doc, "Verify that budget option limits amount of traces"}].
  247: tc_budget_option(Config) ->
  248:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), [{budget, 10}]),
  249:     {ok, [api,rle]} = ssl_trace:on([api,rle]),
  250:     ssl_trace:write("Not a trace from dbg - not included in budget", []),
  251:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  252:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  253:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  254:     CountReceived = fun(Reference) ->
  255:                             ReceiveStats = check_trace_map(Reference, #{}),
  256:                             ReceivedNumbers =
  257:                                 lists:filter(fun is_number/1,
  258:                                              maps:values(ReceiveStats)),
  259:                             lists:sum(ReceivedNumbers)
  260:                     end,
  261:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  262:     ExpectedTraceCnt = 10,
  263:     ActualTraceCnt = CountReceived(Ref),
  264:     case ExpectedTraceCnt == ActualTraceCnt of
  265:         true ->
  266:             ok;
  267:         _ ->
  268:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected ~w traces, but found ~w",
  269:                   [ExpectedTraceCnt, ActualTraceCnt])
  270:     end.
  271: 
  272: tc_file_option() ->
  273:     [{doc, "Verify that file option redirects traces to file"}].
  274: tc_file_option(Config) ->
  275:     _Ref = ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), [{budget, 10}, file]),
  276:     {ok, [api,rle]} = ssl_trace:on([api,rle]),
  277:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  278:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  279:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  280:     ActualTraceCnt = count_line(?TRACE_FILE),
  281:     ExpectedTraceCnt = 11, %% budget + 1 message about end of budget
  282:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  283:     case ExpectedTraceCnt == ActualTraceCnt of
  284:         true ->
  285:             ok;
  286:         _ ->
  287:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected ~w traces, but found ~w",
  288:                   [ExpectedTraceCnt, ActualTraceCnt])
  289:     end.
  290: 
  291: tc_write() ->
  292:     [{doc, "Verify that custom messages can be written"}].
  293: tc_write(_Config) ->
  294:     _Ref = ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), [{budget, 10}, file]),
  295:     {ok, [api,rle]} = ssl_trace:on([api,rle]),
  296:     ssl_trace:write("Custom trace message ~w", [msg]),
  297:     ActualTraceCnt = count_line(?TRACE_FILE),
  298:     ExpectedTraceCnt = 1,
  299:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  300:     case ExpectedTraceCnt == ActualTraceCnt of
  301:         true ->
  302:             ok;
  303:         _ ->
  304:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected ~w traces, but found ~w",
  305:                   [ExpectedTraceCnt, ActualTraceCnt])
  306:     end.
  307: 
  308: tc_check_profiles() ->
  309:     [{doc, "Verify that trace profile contain valid functions"}].
  310: tc_check_profiles(_Config) ->
  311:     CheckFun =
  312:         fun(Profile, Module, Fun, DefinedFunctions) ->
  313:                 case lists:member(Fun, DefinedFunctions) of
  314:                     true -> ok;
  315:                     _ ->
  316:                         {F, A} = Fun,
  317:                         ct:fail("~w:~w/~w from '~w' trace profile not found",
  318:                                 [Module, F, A, Profile])
  319:                 end
  320:         end,
  321:     CheckModule =
  322:         fun(Profile, {Module, Funs}) ->
  323:                 DefinedFunctions = Module:module_info(functions),
  324:                 [CheckFun(Profile, Module, F, DefinedFunctions) ||
  325:                     F <- Funs]
  326:         end,
  327:     CheckTProfile =
  328:         fun({Profile, _, _, ModFunsTuples}) ->
  329:                 [CheckModule(Profile, MFTuple) ||
  330:                     MFTuple <- ModFunsTuples]
  331:         end,
  332:     [CheckTProfile(P) || P <- ssl_trace:trace_profiles()],
  333:     ok.
  334: 
  335: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  336: ssl_trace_start() ->
  337:     ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), []).
  338: 
  339: ssl_trace_start(Ref, TraceOpts) ->
  340:     TestProcess = self(),
  341:     {ok, [_|_]} = ssl_trace:start(fun(Format,Args) ->
  342:                                           ct:log(Format, Args),
  343:                                           TestProcess ! {Ref, Args}
  344:                                   end,
  345:                                   TraceOpts),
  346:     Ref.
  347: 
  348: receive_map(Ref) ->
  349:     Empty = #{call => [], return_from => [], exception_from => [],
  350:               processed => []},
  351:     receive_map(Ref, Empty).
  352: 
  353: receive_map(Ref,
  354:                Map = #{call := Call, return_from := Return,
  355:                        exception_from := Exception, processed := Processed}) ->
  356:     receive
  357:         {Ref, Msg = [_, {call, {_, _, _}}, _]} ->
  358:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{call => [Msg|Call]});
  359:         {Ref, Msg = [_, {return_from, {_, _, _}, _}, _]} ->
  360:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{return_from => [Msg|Return]});
  361:         {Ref, Msg = [_, {exception_from, {_, _, _}, _}, _]} ->
  362:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{exception_from => [Msg|Exception]});
  363:         {Ref, Msg = [_Timestamp, _Pid, _ExpectString]} ->
  364:             %% processed means a trace was processed by Module:handle_trace
  365:             %% function and is not received as a trace tuple
  366:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{processed => [Msg|Processed]})
  367:     after 5000 ->
  368:             Map
  369:     end.
  370: 
  371: check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces) ->
  372:     Received = receive_map(Ref),
  373:     L = [check_key(Type, ExpectedTraces, maps:get(Type, Received)) ||
  374:             Type <- maps:keys(Received)],
  375:     maps:from_list(L).
  376: 
  377: check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces, ExpectedRemainders) ->
  378:     ActualRemainders = check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces),
  379:     case ExpectedRemainders == ActualRemainders of
  380:         true ->
  381:             ok;
  382:         _ ->
  383:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected trace remainders = ~w ~n"
  384:                  "Actual trace remainders = ~w",
  385:                  [ExpectedRemainders, ActualRemainders])
  386:     end.
  387: 
  388: check_key(Type, ExpectedTraces, ReceivedPerType) ->
  389:     ReceivedPerTypeCnt = length(ReceivedPerType),
  390:     ?CT_LOG("Received Type = ~w Messages# = ~w", [Type, ReceivedPerTypeCnt]),
  391:     case ReceivedPerTypeCnt > 0 of
  392:         true ->
  393:             ExpectedPerType = maps:get(Type, ExpectedTraces, []),
  394:             ExpectedPerTypeCnt = length(ExpectedPerType),
  395:             check_trace(Type, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType),
  396:             {Type, ReceivedPerTypeCnt - ExpectedPerTypeCnt};
  397:         _ ->
  398:             {Type, no_trace_received}
  399:     end.
  400: 
  401: -define(CHECK_TRACE(PATTERN, Expected),
  402:         fun({ExpectedString, Module, Function}) ->
  403:                 P2 = fun(Received) ->
  404:                              PATTERN = Received,
  405:                              SearchResult =
  406:                                  string:str(lists:flatten(Txt), ExpectedString),
  407:                              case {Module == M, Function == F, SearchResult > 0} of
  408:                                  {true, true, true} ->
  409:                                      true;
  410:                                  _ -> false
  411:                              end
  412:                      end,
  413:                 Result = lists:any(P2, ReceivedPerType),
  414:                 case Result of
  415:                     false ->
  416:                         F = "Trace not found: {~s, ~w, ~w}",
  417:                         ?CT_FAIL(F, [ExpectedString, Module, Function]);
  418:                     _ -> ok
  419:                 end,
  420:                 Result
  421:         end).
  422: 
  423: -define(CHECK_PROCESSED_TRACE(PATTERN, Expected),
  424:         fun(ExpectedString) ->
  425:                 P2 = fun(Received) ->
  426:                              PATTERN = Received,
  427:                              SearchResult =
  428:                                  string:str(lists:flatten(Txt), ExpectedString),
  429:                              SearchResult > 0
  430:                      end,
  431:                 Result = lists:any(P2, ReceivedPerType),
  432:                 case Result of
  433:                     false ->
  434:                         F = "Processed trace not found: ~s",
  435:                         ?CT_FAIL(F, [ExpectedString]);
  436:                     _ -> ok
  437:                 end,
  438:                 Result
  439:         end).
  440: 
  441: check_trace(call, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  442:     P1 = ?CHECK_TRACE([Txt, {call, {M, F, _Args}}, _], Expected),
  443:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  444: check_trace(return_from, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  445:     P1 = ?CHECK_TRACE([Txt, {return_from, {M, F, _Args}, _Return}, _], Expected),
  446:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  447: check_trace(exception_from, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  448:     P1 = ?CHECK_TRACE([Txt, {exception_from, {M, F, _Args}, _Return}, _], Expected),
  449:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  450: check_trace(processed, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  451:     P1 = ?CHECK_PROCESSED_TRACE([_Timestamp, _Pid, Txt], Expected),
  452:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  453: check_trace(Type, _ExpectedPerType, _ReceivedPerType) ->
  454:     ?CT_FAIL("Type = ~w not checked", [Type]),
  455:     ok.
  456: 
  457: count_line(Filename) ->
  458:     case file:open(Filename, [read]) of
  459:         {ok, IoDevice} ->
  460:             Count = count_line(IoDevice, 0),
  461:             file:close(IoDevice),
  462:             Count;
  463:         {error, Reason} ->
  464:             ?CT_PAL("~s open error  reason:~s~n", [Filename, Reason]),
  465:             ct:fail(Reason)
  466:     end.
  467: 
  468: count_line(IoDevice, Count) ->
  469:     case file:read_line(IoDevice) of
  470:         {ok, _} -> count_line(IoDevice, Count+1);
  471:         eof     -> Count
  472:     end.
  473: 
  474: ssl_connect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  475:     ?CT_LOG("Establishing connection for producing traces", []),
  476:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  477:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  478:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  479:     Server =
  480: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  481: 				   {from, self()},
  482: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  483: 				   {options,  [{keepalive, true},{active, false}
  484: 					       | ServerOpts]}]),
  485:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  486:     Client =
  487: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  488: 				   {host, Hostname},
  489: 				   {from, self()},
  490: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  491: 				   {options, [{keepalive, true},{active, false}
  492: 					      | ClientOpts]}]),
  493:     ?CT_LOG("Testcase ~p, Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [self(), Client, Server]),
  494:     [Server, Client].
